description:
Real-time quotes, a stock ticker, advanced fullscreen charts and much more! MoreStocks offers everything you need to keep pace with the market.

FEATURES:
+ Live ticker while running other apps
+ Real-time quotes for your custom stock list
+ Latest fullscreen charts, including intraday
+ Instant price alerts
+ Market and individual stock news
+ Calendar integration for upcoming events, including earnings reports
+ Portfolio tracking, with Google Finance integration
+ Supports your favorite equities, indices, mutual funds & options
+ And much more

AWARDS:
+ Palm Hot Apps Award Winner
+ PreCentral.net Best of 2010 Nominee

With MoreStocks, trading has never been so easy and effortless!

See more at http://morestocks.com. For help, e-mail stocks@morestocks.com or follow us on Twitter @ MoreStocks.

This application is only available in English for US-based stocks. A valid e-mail address and phone number must be supplied to save personal settings and receive instant price alerts.
